website_summaries.verdict: Compact and budget-friendly, this headlamp is ideal for travel, camping, or dog-walking.
pros: Soft, adjustable band is comfortable and stays put
LED light bulbs have a maximum brightness of 175 lumens
cons: Somewhat limited compared to other Black Diamond models, but performs according to its price

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean pattern. No yellow ring.
customer_reviews.text: I returned an earlier purchase of a Black Diamond Spot headlamp. It had a distracting yellow ring in the middle of the beam. Drove me crazy. I emailed Black Diamond customer support with my issue and they suggested the Astro 175. It was just the ticket. Broad clean consistent pattern with no hot spots or yellow rings and a few bucks cheaper. If you're looking for a good usable no frills headlamp, this might be your huckleberry.
customer_reviews.author: Val Richard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite headlamp
customer_reviews.text: When you want a headlamp that just goes on and off no strobe ( even tho you can have that if you want with this ) and no red light....efficient and bright and just useful....I hate other headlamps when you can't get it to stop flashing or you push on the red light vs the white light this one is just on and off...bam. All I need and not expensive and comes with batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Fultz

customer_reviews.title: perfect option for camping
customer_reviews.text: This was just perfect for camping -- the lamp itself can swivel to point down to the ground or to whatever you're doing with your hands. Loved it! It was the perfect item to finish out my supply of camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: Rice Majors

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Great Headlamp for a good price. Very lightweight with an adjustable strap and comes with 3 Duracell AAA batteries. I wanted something ligthweight that didn't require 6 batteries like other alkaline models. I also did NOT want a rechargeable battery, as I use this intermittenly and when I need it I can't be relying on having to charge at the moment I need it (which often is an unplanned use).
customer_reviews.author: AmznRev10

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Light!!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this for getting up at night set on the lowest setting so I don't disturb anyone in the house. The batteries last FOREVER on the lowest setting. With rechargeable batteries in, it is just a little bit dimmer than with alkaline batteries but still puts out PLENTY of light for how I use it. Great for a camping light also! :D
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does what a $20, 175 lumen headlamp should do
customer_reviews.text: The beam is not adjustable to focus on distance. This is not a major issue but the option would be nice to be able to pick up larger critters like Javelina before you get too close. The beam is concentrated in a 8 foot wide by12 feet ahead arc and is still light enough beyond that to pick up rattlers (3 this month) for another 6 feet on either side beyond the 8 foot arc . The head band is comfortable and easy to adjust. I hope it is made in the US, although they do have a production facility in China.
customer_reviews.author: wolfhound

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year... Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality product. I have had it for about a year. I use it only when I walk my dogs at night. Went to use it last night and it started flickering, I thought the batteries might be going dead, so I changed them to no avail. Still flickers and or doesn't turn on. When it does turn on I can slightly tap it and it goes right back off. Save your money and buy something more reliable...
customer_reviews.author: Sam Young

customer_reviews.title: Such a simple piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: No-nonsense, bare-bones functionality, good idea for a product! Black Diamond has an opportunity to strive for perfection with it. Alas, perfect it is not. For one, the battery latch design is flawed. The battery compartment pops open easily. 2 Stars for pleasing visual design and (seemingly) high-quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: ejbwc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great headlamp. I bought this for my 9 year old daughter while camping and she had zero problems. The on/off button is large and easy to find, even with gloves on. The headband is wide enough that it’s not digging into your head, and the angle adjustment detents are firm.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hall

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a previous Black Diamond headlamp that had served me well. I use headlamps for hiking in the dark. For me, the beam pattern was too wide. I used it a number of times thinking I would get used to it, but I never did. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I have several Black Diamond headlamps and I have never had any trouble with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry N

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Simple, bright and light. I like the adjustable brightness and ability to turn on and off at the same brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Khark

customer_reviews.title: Great for night running.
customer_reviews.text: Used this light on a night trail run. Worked perfectly and provided plenty of light to run the trail safely. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. O'Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: It was $18, what more do you want. Cheap plastic, but it works awesome. We'll see how long is lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great running headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my head and with a hat! Has a ton of settings to adjust and can be seen from very far away. Great for night runs. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp overall. But figuring out how to lock it has been hard.
customer_reviews.author: dave reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the fast shipping during these hard times!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Nazelrod

customer_reviews.title: Assistance for the visually impaired
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom who has macular degeneration - it is very helpful for her, providing additional light for reading and playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headlight
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. Nice and bright for nighttime walking.
customer_reviews.author: Ciderman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product I love it!!! fit even my large skull
customer_reviews.author: jairy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super long battery life. Cheap. Three settings. Bright/strobe/and when you hold down the light can dim to the exact setting you want. Worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and bright
customer_reviews.text: This is great for camping. The ability to dim by just holding down the button is a good design. A little clunky to re-size. The brightness is really good for the deep woods. The design of small, streamline makes this really functional.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Jagoda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for a few weeks now and really like this light would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Used while camping
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it says it does, allowing hands-free tasks in the dark. I purchased for use while camping.
customer_reviews.author: PW

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Astro 175 Headlamp
product_meta.description: The BLACK DIAMOND Cosmo 225 Headlamp is a safe and smart choice to bring with you just in case. It is compact, easy to stash, and bright enough to light the way down unexpected rappels and dark trails. With updated optical efficiency, it offers 175 lumens of light and a longer battery life, and Black Diamond even gave it water resistant housing for those emergencies that happen in inclement weather.
feature_bullets: Headlamp. LED bulb. Compact, low-profile design is easy to stash in your pocket or pack.
Three adjustable modes: Full Strength, Dimming, and Strobe. Brightness memory retains your last setting. 3 AAA batteries (included).
Water resistant. Maximum brightness: 175 lumen. Maximum burn time: 8 hours.
Maximum distance: 35 meters. Stormproof housing can handle rain and snow. Weight: 2.8 oz..

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
